scripts.install:all: npm run install:shared && npm run install:app1 && npm run install:app2
scripts.dev: npm run dev:shared:build & npm run dev:shared:preview & npm run dev:app1 & npm run dev:app2 & wait
scripts.dev:shared:preview: sleep 5 && cd shared && npm run preview
scripts.dev:app1: sleep 8 && cd app1 && npm run dev
scripts.dev:app2: sleep 8 && cd app2 && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run preview:shared & sleep 5 && npm run build:apps && kill $!
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:app1 && npm run build:app2
